byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and SCOTT SHANE
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Anthony Shadid from Beirut, Lebanon; Eric Schmitt, Steven Lee Myers and Mark Landler from Washington; J. David Goodman and Benjamin Weiser from New York; and Randal C. Archibold from Mexico City.

snippet: Federal authorities said they have foiled a plot by men linked to the Iranian government to kill the Saudi ambassador to the United States and to bomb Saudi and Israeli Embassies.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said they have foiled a plot by men linked to the Iranian government to kill the Saudi ambassador to the United States and to bomb Saudi and Israeli Embassies.

headline.main: Iranians Accused of a Plot to Kill Saudis’ U.S. Envoy
headline.print_headline: Iranians Accused Of A Plot to Kill SAUDIS’ U.S. ENVOY
